## ๐น ุงููููุฒุงุช
- ุชุญููู ุจูู ูุญุฏุงุช ุงูุทููุ ุงููุฒูุ ุงูุญุฌูุ ุงูุฒููุ ูุงูุญุฑุงุฑุฉ.  
- ูุฑููุฉ ูุงููุฉ: ูููู ูููุณุชุฎุฏู ุงุฎุชูุงุฑ ุฃู ูุญุฏุฉ ุฃุตููุฉ ูุฃู ูุญุฏุฉ ููุชุญููู.

## ๐น ุงููุญุฏุงุช ุงููุฏุนููุฉ

### **ุงูุทูู (Length)**
- ูุชุฑ (m), ุณูุชููุชุฑ (cm), ููููุชุฑ (mm), ูููููุชุฑ (km)  
- ุฅูุด (inch), ูุฏู (ft), ูุงุฑุฏุฉ (yd), ููู (mile), ููู ุจุญุฑู (nmi)  
- ูููุฑููุชุฑ (ยตm), ูุงูููุชุฑ (nm)  

### **ุงููุฒู / ุงููุชูุฉ (Weight)**
- ููููุบุฑุงู (mg), ุบุฑุงู (g), ููููุฌุฑุงู (kg), ุทู ูุชุฑู (ton)  
- ุจุงููุฏ (lb), ุฃููุตุฉ (oz), ูููุฑูุบุฑุงู (ยตg)  

### **ุงูุญุฌู / ุงูุณุนุฉ (Volume)**
- ููููุชุฑ (ml), ูุชุฑ (l), ูุชุฑ ููุนุจ (m3)  
- ููุนูุฉ ุตุบูุฑุฉ (tsp), ููุนูุฉ ูุจูุฑุฉ (tbsp), ููุจ (cup)  
- ุจุงููุช (pt), ููุงุฑุชุฑ (qt), ุฌุงููู (gal), ุฃููุตุฉ ุณุงุฆูุฉ (fl_oz)  

### **ุงูุฒูู (Time)**
- ุซุงููุฉ (s), ุฏูููุฉ (min), ุณุงุนุฉ (h), ููู (day), ุฃุณุจูุน (week), ุดูุฑ (month), ุณูุฉ (year)  

### **ุงูุญุฑุงุฑุฉ (Temperature)**
- Celsius (C), Fahrenheit (F), Kelvin (K), Rankine (R)  

---

## ๐น ุงูุชุซุจูุช
ููููู ูุณุฎ ุงููููุงุช ูุจุงุดุฑุฉ ุฅูู ูุดุฑูุนู ุฃู ุชุญููููุง ุฅูู ููุชุจุฉ ูุงุจูุฉ ูููุดุฑ.  

```bash


from unit_converter import (
    convert_length,
    convert_weight,
    convert_volume,
    convert_time,
    convert_temperature
)

# --------- ุงูุทูู (Length) ---------
print("=== Length ===")
print("10 km =", convert_length(10, "km", "mile"), "mile")
print("12 inch =", convert_length(12, "inch", "cm"), "cm")
print("2 mile =", convert_length(2, "mile", "km"), "km")

# --------- ุงููุฒู / ุงููุชูุฉ (Weight) ---------
print("\n=== Weight ===")
print("5 kg =", convert_weight(5, "kg", "lb"), "lb")
print("16 oz =", convert_weight(16, "oz", "g"), "g")
print("1000 g =", convert_weight(1000, "g", "kg"), "kg")

# --------- ุงูุญุฌู / ุงูุณุนุฉ (Volume) ---------
print("\n=== Volume ===")
print("3 l =", convert_volume(3, "l", "gal"), "gal")
print("2 cup =", convert_volume(2, "cup", "ml"), "ml")
print("1 m3 =", convert_volume(1, "m3", "l"), "l")

# --------- ุงูุฒูู (Time) ---------
print("\n=== Time ===")
print("2 hours =", convert_time(2, "h", "min"), "minutes")
print("1 day =", convert_time(1, "day", "s"), "seconds")
print("3 week =", convert_time(3, "week", "day"), "days")

# --------- ุงูุญุฑุงุฑุฉ (Temperature) ---------
print("\n=== Temperature ===")
print("100ยฐC =", convert_temperature(100, "C", "F"), "ยฐF")
print("0ยฐC =", convert_temperature(0, "C", "K"), "K")
print("32ยฐF =", convert_temperature(32, "F", "C"), "ยฐC")
